name: ZombieWave (TheOnly1ZombieGamer)
description:
This is an extremely early version of the game. It does not have all features and its not even ready for alpha stage yet but I thought I'd throw it up here just to have it here if anyone wants to see what it looks like.

Use W, A, S, and D to move around, after picking up your weapons use the 1, 2 and 3 keys to switch between them. Use your primary mouse button to shoot when holding a gun. The green cubes are the enemies for now. Have fun!
